abstract: The company’s quarterly profit more than doubled but the results were hurt by costs associated with the purchase of Wyeth, a rival drug maker.
snippet: The company’s quarterly profit more than doubled but the results were hurt by costs associated with the purchase of Wyeth, a rival drug maker.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the world’s biggest drug maker, said fourth-quarter profit missed analysts’ estimates on costs from its acquisition of Wyeth and projected lower-than-expected earnings in 2010.

headline.main: Pfizer Misses Estimates, and Shares Slide
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Misses Estimates, and Shares Slide

abstract: Investors were cautious on Wednesday as concerns over high unemployment and the ability of businesses to bring in revenue resurfaced, tempering some of the zeal that had marked Wall Street earlier this week.
snippet: Investors were cautious on Wednesday as concerns over high unemployment and the ability of businesses to bring in revenue resurfaced, tempering some of the zeal that had marked Wall Street earlier this week.
lead_paragraph: Investors were cautious on Wednesday as concerns over high unemployment and the ability of businesses to bring in revenue resurfaced, tempering some of the zeal that had marked Wall Street earlier this week.

headline.main: Concerned Over Jobs and Revenue, Wall St. Wanders
